jobDescription: Summary of Responsibilities Meet agency profitability and production objectives for an assigned group of agencies by underwriting new commercial business, renewal policies and policy endorsements. Understand and evaluate exposures related to individual risks through continued mentoring involvement. Integrate these functions within the workflow of a Commercial Lines Underwriter. Assist in the analysis of individual agency and book of business results to determine if any corrective actions are needed. Support the Commercial Lines Underwriting Division and the Regional Sales Manager in identifying corrective measures needed to assure an underwriting profit. Help in establishing specific action plans where needed and assist in communicating these effectively with agents. Assist the Regional Sales Manager in developing written premium goals at an agency and book of business level. Support achievement of these goals by promoting the benefits of our product line to agencies by personal visits, regular telephone contact and appropriate promotional mailings. Communicate effectively with agencies in the development of underwriting and exposure information and supports attainment of written premium goals by providing legendary service. Experience and Skills 7+ years experience in commercial multi-line underwriting  Excellent oral and written communication skills Education and Training Bachelor's degree in Business, Insurance or related field
